messages.message:
I actually think this is a great suggestion! We should support better filtering in all workspaces. For example, I put my demos in the product-team workspace and I would love a filter that says created by me so that I could easily get back to those (despite them being made available for all people).

Google drive does this nicely where for every shared drive you can filter by type (we support this today), people (this could be a created by) and modified.
I think this is something worth adding as there is definitely a need in shared workspaces to be able to easily find assets that might have been created by you or someone else.
